app.title: Dhaka University Academic Portal
app.description: Excellence in Education - Shaping Tomorrow's Leaders

hero.title: Excellence in Education
hero.subtitle: Shaping Tomorrow's Leaders at Dhaka University
hero.description: Join our prestigious academic community where innovation meets tradition, and every student is empowered to achieve their highest potential.

features.title: Why Choose Our Institution?
features.subtitle: We provide world-class education with a commitment to excellence, innovation, and student success.

academic_excellence.title: Academic Excellence
academic_excellence.description: Rigorous curriculum designed by leading educators and industry experts to ensure comprehensive learning.

research_innovation.title: Research & Innovation
research_innovation.description: Cutting-edge research facilities and programs that foster innovation and critical thinking skills.

expert_faculty.title: Expert Faculty
expert_faculty.description: Dedicated and experienced teachers committed to nurturing each student's unique potential and talents.

modern_technology.title: Modern Technology
modern_technology.description: State-of-the-art facilities and digital learning tools to enhance the educational experience.

global_community.title: Global Community
global_community.description: International programs and partnerships that provide students with a global outlook and cultural awareness.

career_support.title: Career Support
career_support.description: Comprehensive career guidance and placement support to help students achieve their professional goals.

programs.title: Our Academic Programs
programs.subtitle: Comprehensive educational programs designed to prepare students for success in their chosen fields and future careers.

undergraduate.title: Undergraduate Programs
undergraduate.description: Bachelor's degree programs across multiple disciplines with comprehensive curriculum and hands-on learning experiences.

graduate.title: Graduate Programs
graduate.description: Master's degree programs offering specialized knowledge and advanced research opportunities in various fields.

doctoral.title: Doctoral Programs
doctoral.description: PhD programs for aspiring researchers and scholars to contribute original knowledge to their field of study.

professional.title: Professional Development
professional.description: Certificate and diploma programs designed for working professionals to enhance their skills and career prospects.

online.title: Online Learning
online.description: Flexible online degree and certificate programs that allow students to learn from anywhere in the world.

continuing.title: Continuing Education
continuing.description: Lifelong learning opportunities including workshops, seminars, and short courses for personal and professional growth.

elementary.title: Elementary Education
elementary.description: Foundation building years focusing on core subjects and developing fundamental learning skills.

middle_school.title: Middle School
middle_school.description: Transitional years with increased academic rigor and introduction to specialized subjects.

high_school.title: High School
high_school.description: College preparatory curriculum with advanced placement courses and career guidance.

news.title: Latest News & Updates
news.subtitle: Stay informed about our latest achievements, events, and developments in the academic community.

academic_excellence_award.title: University Receives Academic Excellence Award
academic_excellence_award.description: Our institution has been honored with the prestigious Academic Excellence Award for outstanding contributions to higher education and student success. This recognition reflects our commitment to maintaining the highest standards of education and research.

new_research_center.title: Opening of Advanced Research Center
new_research_center.description: We are excited to announce the opening of our new state-of-the-art research center, equipped with cutting-edge technology and facilities. This center will enable groundbreaking research across multiple disciplines and foster innovation among our faculty and students.

student_achievements.title: Students Win International Competition
student_achievements.description: Our talented students have achieved remarkable success in the International Academic Olympiad, securing top positions in mathematics, science, and technology categories. This achievement demonstrates the exceptional quality of education and student support at our institution.

international_partnership.title: New International Partnership Announced
international_partnership.description: We have established a strategic partnership with leading universities worldwide to enhance student exchange programs, collaborative research opportunities, and global learning experiences. This partnership opens new doors for our students and faculty.

technology_upgrade.title: Campus Technology Infrastructure Upgrade
technology_upgrade.description: Our campus has completed a major technology infrastructure upgrade, including high-speed internet, smart classrooms, and digital learning platforms. These improvements will significantly enhance the teaching and learning experience for our entire community.

community_outreach.title: Community Outreach Program Launch
community_outreach.description: We are proud to launch our new community outreach program, aimed at providing educational support and resources to underserved communities. This initiative reflects our commitment to social responsibility and community engagement.

science_fair.title: Science Fair 2025
science_fair.description: Students showcase innovative projects in our annual science fair. Amazing discoveries and creativity on display.

sports_championship.title: Sports Championship
sports_championship.description: Our school teams excel in regional sports competitions, bringing home multiple trophies and medals.

stem_lab.title: New STEM Lab Opening
stem_lab.description: State-of-the-art STEM laboratory equipped with modern technology opens its doors to students.

cta.title: Ready to Join Our Community?
cta.subtitle: Take the first step towards an exceptional educational journey. Our admissions team is here to guide you through the process.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Excellence in Education Since 1999
about.description: We are committed to providing world-class education that empowers students to become leaders and innovators in their chosen fields, fostering holistic development and lifelong learning.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide world-class education that empowers students to become leaders and innovators in their chosen fields while fostering critical thinking, creativity, and social responsibility.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be a globally recognized institution that shapes the future through excellence in education, groundbreaking research, and meaningful community engagement.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Integrity, excellence, innovation, and inclusivity are the core values that guide everything we do and shape our institutional culture.

core_values.title: Our Foundation
core_values.subtitle: The principles that guide our educational mission and institutional culture

excellence.title: Academic Excellence
excellence.description: Maintaining the highest standards in teaching, research, and student achievement across all programs and disciplines.

innovation.title: Innovation & Research
innovation.description: Fostering a culture of innovation and supporting cutting-edge research that addresses global challenges.

integrity.title: Integrity & Ethics
integrity.description: Upholding the highest ethical standards in all our academic, research, and administrative activities.

inclusivity.title: Diversity & Inclusion
inclusivity.description: Creating an inclusive environment that celebrates diversity and provides equal opportunities for all.

achievements.title: Our Achievements
achievements.subtitle: Milestones that reflect our commitment to excellence and growth

students.title: Students
students.description: Active learners from around the world

history.title: Our Journey
history.subtitle: Key milestones in our institutional development and growth

founded.title: Institution Founded
founded.description: Established with a vision to provide quality education and foster innovation in learning.

accreditation.title: Full Accreditation
accreditation.description: Received comprehensive accreditation recognizing our academic standards and quality.

expansion.title: Campus Expansion
expansion.description: Expanded facilities to accommodate growing student body and enhanced research capabilities.

recognition.title: National Recognition
recognition.description: Awarded national recognition for excellence in education and research innovation.

digital.title: Digital Transformation
digital.description: Implemented comprehensive digital learning platforms and hybrid education models.

leadership.title: Leadership Team
leadership.subtitle: Experienced leaders guiding our institutional mission and vision

president.bio: Leading the institution with a focus on academic excellence and strategic growth.

provost.bio: Overseeing academic programs and ensuring educational quality across all departments.

dean_engineering.bio: Leading innovative engineering programs and fostering industry partnerships.

dean_business.bio: Developing business programs that prepare students for global careers.

dean_sciences.bio: Advancing scientific research and education in natural sciences.

director_research.bio: Coordinating research initiatives and fostering innovation across disciplines.

cta.title: Join Our Academic Community
cta.subtitle: Become part of our legacy of excellence and start your journey towards academic and professional success.

admissions.title: Admissions
admissions.subtitle: Join Our Academic Community
admissions.description: Learn about our admission process and requirements to become part of our educational excellence and vibrant academic community.

process.title: Admission Process
process.subtitle: Simple steps to join our academic community

step1.title: Apply Online
step1.description: Complete your application form online with all required information and personal statement.

step2.title: Submit Documents
step2.description: Upload all required documents, academic transcripts, and supporting materials.

step3.title: Interview
step3.description: Attend an admission interview with our academic committee to discuss your goals.

step4.title: Enrollment
step4.description: Complete enrollment process and begin your exciting academic journey with us.

requirements.title: Admission Requirements
requirements.subtitle: What you need to apply for admission

additional.title: Need Help with Requirements?
additional.description: Our admissions team is here to assist you with any questions about requirements, deadlines, or the application process.

timeline.title: Important Dates

application_open.title: Applications Open
application_open.description: Online applications become available for the upcoming academic year.

early_deadline.description: Deadline for early decision applications with priority consideration.

regular_deadline.title: Regular Admission Deadline
regular_deadline.description: Final deadline for regular admission applications.

interview_period.title: Interview Period
interview_period.description: Admission interviews conducted for qualified candidates.

decision_release.title: Admission Decisions
decision_release.description: Admission decisions released to all applicants.

enrollment_deadline.title: Enrollment Deadline
enrollment_deadline.description: Final deadline to confirm enrollment and submit deposits.

cta.title: Ready to Begin Your Journey?
cta.subtitle: Take the first step towards joining our academic community. Our admissions team is here to support you throughout the process.
